title: World’s Biggest Hotel Family Announces Wild Atlantic Way Ireland Offer
text:
Dublin, Ireland (prbuzz) July 15, 2015 - Best Western International is extending 10 percent discount on all hotels across Ireland as part of its Wild Atlantic Way in Ireland offer. The special promo code is available on the best Western website www.bestwestern.ie.
“We are glad to announce that presently we are offering a handy 10% rebate on the Best Available Rate at all our hotels across Ireland. This special offer is in support of 2015 Wild Atlantic Way,” stated a chief spokeswoman from Best Western International.
Revered as the World’s Biggest Hotel Family, Best Western International has been running for more than 6 decades now with 4,000 hotels in more than 100 countries. There are 11 Best Western hotels in Ireland, located in Dublin, Mayo, Belfast, Cork, Londonderry, Sligo & Wexford.
The Wild Atlantic Way Ireland is a part of Best Western’s latest Special Package roster. “We have launched an extensive Special Package roster given our commitment to client convenience. It’s our aim here to let you relish our premium service at rates to fit your budget.”
The spokesperson mentioned ”If you are planning to stay longer with us, we will reward you with a discount of up to 30% – as per our Stay Longer For Less offer. You would have to pick 2 or 3 night 'Stay and Save' rate from our website to avail the offer”
Speaking about their rooms, one of the Best Western International hotel managers mentioned about a wide array of deluxe rooms backed by all the cutting-edge amenities such as super comfortable beds, complimentary Wi-Fi, AC, flat-screen TV, integrated work-desk, laptop sized safes and more.
“Whether you are on vacation or on business tour or looking for a premier wedding venue- our deluxe hotels are sure to take your breath away. We promise you warm hospitality amidst stylish & charming surrounds,” commented the general manager of one of the hotels.
About Best Western International
Best Western International is the World’s Biggest Hotel Family with 4,000 hotels in more than 100 countries, including 11 in Ireland. For more details, visit http://www.bestwestern.ie/
